Wizard.Name: Wizard
Wizard.P1 L1: Discard 1 upgrade to move 1 extra tile.

Mounted Knight.Name: Horseman
Mounted Knight.P1 L1: Move up to 2 tiles and attack in a straight line.

Golen.Name: Golem
Golen.P1 L1: Can be summoned near any friendly troop.

Fenix.Name: Phoenix
Fenix.P1 L1: When killed, can be resurrected using 1 coin from the supply.
Fenix.P2 L1: Fly 2 tiles to defend one of your bases.

Necromancer.Name: Necromancer
Necromancer.P1 L1: After attacking or conquering base tile, draw 1 coin and use it immediately.

General.Name: General
General.P1 L1: Uses your coin to activate any friendly troop up to 2 tiles away from you.

Griffin.Name: Griffin
Griffin.P1 L1: Grab 1 friendly troop up to 2 tiles away and move it one tile keeping it 2 spaces from

Centaur.Name: Centaur
Centaur.P1 L1: Attack the first troop up to 2 tiles away in a straight line.
Centaur.P2 L1: Can attack adjacent tiles using horse legs.

Minion.Name: Minion
Minion.P1 L1: Up to 2 minions can exist on the board at the same time.
Minion.P2 L1: Move all minions on the board

Giant.Name: Giant
Giant.P1 L1: Can only be damaged by upgraded troops.

Minotaur.Name: Minotaur
Minotaur.P1 L1: When attacked in close combat, retaliates with one damage.

fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?
You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?
You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

93hx.text:
Instructions:

   In your bag (holder next to refill) you should have 9 tokens. 2 from each troop + 1 coin.

   Each turn drag 3 token from your bag to the hand (holder in the bottom middle). If you don't have enough token, drag as many as you can from your bag and then press on refill to get enough token on your bag.
Example: if you have 2 tokens on you your bag, drag those 2 token to your hand, press refill and get another token to your hand.

   If you put card in the board grid it will no longer be automatically taken by the bag, if you to it by accident you will need to put it in the bag it manually only once.

    To discard a destroyed troop, put it in the circular holder at the top of the board.

fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?
You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?
You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

info.name: Fantasy Wars
info.attribution:
Choose your troops by adding them to your holders by clicking in one of the default troops buttons or get random troops by clicking in the random button.
Then take 2 tokens from each troop and adding them to your side of the table.
Click the reset button on the bottom to refill and shuffle your bag.
Each turn drag three pieces from your bag the hand (middle-bottom). If you don't have enough pieces press the rest button again after you dragged all the pieces you had on your bag to the hand.

Implementation design by RaphaelAlvez and released under CC0.
Assets license may vary.

Wood texture: https://unsplash.com/photos/J2gEgTPM_OA
Cloth texture: https://unsplash.com/photos/xTaOPMa6wAE

Celtic knot: https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/338646-celtic-symbols

Troops assets modified from https://game-icons.net/

--

Choose your troops by adding them to your holders or get random troops by clicking in the reset button.
Then take 2 tokens from each troop and adding them to your side of the table.
Click the reset button on the bottom to refill and shuffle your bag.
Each turn drag three pieces from your bag the hand (middle-bottom). If you don't have enough pieces press the rest button again after you dragged all the pieces you had on your bag to the hand.

Implementation design by RaphaelAlvez and released under CC0.
Assets license may vary.

Wood texture: https://unsplash.com/photos/J2gEgTPM_OA

info.description: Choose and place tokens with special powers to fight for space on board with hexagon shaped areas.  First player who places designated tokes in specific spaces wins.
